```{r}

coords_to_xy <- function(x, y, elevation){
  ex <- extent(elevation)
  x = ((x-ex@xmin)/(ex@xmax-ex@xmin))*ncol(elevation)
  y = (1-(y-ex@ymin)/(ex@ymax-ex@ymin))*nrow(elevation)
  out <- c(x,y)
  names(out) <- c("x","y")
  return(out)
}


```
